EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mike, Great news, I found a video tutorial you check it out here View Video Tutorial <http://c967757.r57.cf2.rackcdn.com/MBO%20Tutorial%206_7.mp4>Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Valerisys Consulting [mailto:michael.gallo@valerisys.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 27, 2012 7:33 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Mike Gallow Thanks Sara, that would be great. If you can't find a video, do you have your own account in which you could show me via a Web-Ex session?
Mike______________________________________________Michael GalloValerisys Consulting301.448.7578 (p)888.400.8199 (f) Web: http://www.valerisys.com <http://www.valerisys.com>Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/valerisys <http://www.twitter.com/valerisys>LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/gallomichael <http://www.linkedin.com/in/gallomichael>On 11/27/2012 6:08 PM, Sara Conde wrote:Hi Mike, I did have a great Thanksgiving, thank you for asking. I hope you did as well. MBO Access is currently only available to active MBO Associates. I will see if I can get my hands on a demo video for you. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Valerisys Consulting [mailto:michael.gallo@valerisys.com <mailto:michael.gallo@valerisys.com>] Sent: Monday, November 26, 2012 4:22 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Mike Gallow Hi Sara.
Hope you had a great Thanksgiving. In a previous email exchange, I asked you about using the MBO platform to set up a profile and use as a means for finding projects and teaming with other consultants on larger jobs. I clicked on a link in a previous email to review a one-page description of MBO's platform. Is there a webinar, video, or document that provides additional information on your platform.
Bottom line: I need to fully exploit all possible channels to find engagements. If being inside the MBO network allows me to uncover opportunities, then I'm willing to sign up and participate within MBO's network.
Mike______________________________________________Michael GalloValerisys Consulting301.448.7578 (p)888.400.8199 (f) Web: http://www.valerisys.com <http://www.valerisys.com>Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/valerisys <http://www.twitter.com/valerisys>LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/gallomichael <http://www.linkedin.com/in/gallomichael>On 11/23/2012 11:57 AM, Sara Conde wrote:Hello Mike,I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MTk4NDYmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUwNzQ0MTImZW1haWxpZD1taWNoYWVsLmdhbGxvQHZhbGVyaXN5cy5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MjA5LTk1OTY3LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7uUrXrHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MTImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUxMiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MTk4NDYmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUwNzQ0MTImZW1haWxpZD1taWNoYWVsLmdhbGxvQHZhbGVyaXN5cy5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MjA5LTk1OTY3LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7uUrXrHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDS9QhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> </body
